tool.name: Create text file

param.name: line
param.label: Characters to insert
param.help: Specify the characters that will be inserted X times in every line

param.name: repeat_select_opts
param.label: Specify the number of iterations by

param.name: infile
param.label: Template file
param.help: For every line, the specified characters will be written once. That means X is the line-number from the given file.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This tool creates a text file with recurring lines. You can specify a bunch of characters or entire sentences. The entire string will be printed X times separated by a line break. X can be either given by the use as a number or calculated by a given file. In case the user provides a file, the line number will be used as X.
